name: Pixel Stories of Dungeon
description: Pixel Stories of Dungeon is a dungeon crawler game with roguelike elements inspired by the Mystery Dungeon series. It's a difficult game and will offer you many exciting battles.You will face many dangerous enemies, will you be able to prove you are a real Hero?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 8800 or RadeonÂ® HD4800 series, 512 MB of memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
